Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Taylor/Racine
ShortDescription: Eastbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Racine, Roosevelt, Morgan and Taylor: due to, street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Taylor, Racine, Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor and over regular route, due to street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
